title: Zwift Academy is Back! Ride your way from the basement to the pros!
content:
Zwift Academy is back. Registration opened on August 18th for Zwift’s online training program and the community-oriented Academy which commences on August 30th. The cycling training program is best known for its talent ID program, which has helped 9 riders go pro. But, despite offering 2 pro contracts with Alpecin Fenix and CANYON//SRAM, the program […]

The post Zwift Academy is Back! Ride your way from the basement to the pros! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ilana Newman
